name: Sigiriya Rock Fortress
description: An ancient rock fortress and UNESCO World Heritage Site, Sigiriya is one of Sri Lanka's most iconic landmarks. The 5th-century citadel features stunning frescoes, the Mirror Wall, and breathtaking views from the summit.

crowd_info.best_time_to_visit: Early morning (6:30 AM) to avoid crowds and heat

cultural_guidelines.dress_code: Comfortable clothing with covered shoulders and knees recommended
behavior: Climb can be strenuous - bring water
Be cautious of wasps near the summit
